main event: An unidentified flying object was observed in Northeast Pennsylvania on June 25, 2002. The object was first seen as a bright flash and then moved quickly before disappearing.
interesting points: The object was described as saucer-shaped and bright silver in color, The sighting lasted for approximately 10-15 minutes, The object reflected sunlight, It was considered an Unidentified Flying Object by both a State Policeman and a civilian, The object's movement was initially stationary before it started moving very fast.
witness description: A State Policeman and a civilian
